name: 陳晏笙
objective:
1. Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
2. Two-Port Network Analysis
3. Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis 
4. Frequency Selective Circuits
5. Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
6. Transmission Line Theory
schedule:
第一週	Introduction
第二週	Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
第三週	Balanced Three-Phase Circuits
第四週	Two-Port Network Analysis
第五週	停課一次
第六週	Two-Port Network Analysis
第七週	春假
第八週	Two-Port Network Analysis
第九週	期中考
第十週	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十一週	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十二週	Laplace Transform and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十三週	Frequency Selective Circuits
第十四週	Frequency Selective Circuits
第十五週	Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十六週	Fourier Series and Its Application in Circuit Analysis
第十七週	Transmission Line Theory
第十八週	期末考
materials:
課本：
自編講義

參考書目：
1.	James Nilsson and Susan Riedel, Electric Circuits: 9th Edition, Prentice Hall
2.	陳在泩（編譯自上述課本），電路學下，東華書局
